column5: Our place is 10 min from IAH and 25 min from the home of Super Bowl LI at NRG stadium. We have 2 queen beds and 2 air mattresses. 2 full baths with garden tubs. Full kitchen. Washer and dryer. Living room provides additional sleeping space. Steps away from grilling/patio area. Gated community. Willing to discuss arrangements of getting guests to and from airport. Please contact us with any questions.
